summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3928 for the improvement of North and East 45th Street, from Stone Way to University Way; by the installation of a street lighting system, under Ordinance No. 47832, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
